item.title: Flows the Wrong Way: Streaming into Elixir
item.description: As part of a new and exciting project, I was faced with the task of ingesting a large amount of more or less homogeneous JSON data into a SQL database for an associate of mine to do some rudimentary business intelligence analysis on it. The context complicated things: the bulk data was a bunch of historical social media data, and in future he would also want to ingest the live API in addition to this archived historical data.
